wikipedia.title: Clerical fascism
wikipedia.summary: Clerical fascism (also clero-fascism or clerico-fascism) is an ideology that combines the political and economic doctrines of fascism with clericalism, i.e.

wikipedia.title: Religious nationalism
wikipedia.summary: Religious nationalism is the relationship of nationalism to a particular religious belief, dogma, or affiliation.

wikipedia.title: Religious nationalism
wikipedia.summary: Religious nationalism is the relationship of nationalism to a particular religious belief, dogma, or affiliation.

wikipedia.title: Christian nationalism
wikipedia.summary: Christian nationalism is Christianity-affiliated religious nationalism. Christian nationalists focus primarily on internal politics, such as passing laws that reflect their view of Christianity and its role in political and social life.

wikipedia.title: Catholic clergy involvement with the Ustaše
wikipedia.summary: Catholic clergy involvement with the Ustaše covers the role of the Croatian Catholic Church in the Independent State of Croatia (NDH), a Nazi puppet state created on the territory of Axis-occupied Yugoslavia in 1941.

wikipedia.title: Serbian historiography
wikipedia.summary: Serbian historiography refers to the historiography (methodology of history studies) of the Serb people since the founding of Serbian statehood.
